summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Three Thousand, Seven Hundred Sixty and Fifty-four One-hundredths (3760.54) Dollars, or so much thereof as maybe necessary, from the Water Fund, to aid in the completing of the improvement of Westlake Avenue, from Denny Way to Pine Street, by constructing water mains therein, as provided for in Ordinance No. 12820, creating Local Improvement District No. 1127.
